settings.setting: Share your videos with friends, family, and the world on Site Name.

phrases.phrase: Are you sure? This will delete all videos that belong to this category and cannot be undone.
{full_name} added a new comment on {item_user_name}'s video.
{full_name} added a new comment on their own video.
{full_name} added a new comment on your video.
{owner_full_name} added a new video "{title}".
Be the First to Add a Video.
Click here to delete this image and upload a new one in its place.
Control who can comment on this video.
Control who can see this video.
Uploading copyrighted videos without the explicit consent of the copyright owner will result in your profile being cancelled.
Embedding this video is not allowed. Try another video.
{full_name} commented on {gender} video "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on {other_full_name}'s video "{title}. To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on your video "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} liked your video "{title}" To view this video follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} wrote a comment on your video "{title}".
Not a valid file. We only allow: {sAllow}
Not a valid site. Valid sites: {aSites}
Not a valid video to display.
No videos added yet. Click here to add a new video.
No videos have been added yet.
Please provide a valid URL for your video.
Provide a category this video will belong to.
Provide a title for this video.
Remove the spotlight from this video.
List of all the latest videos.

<title>Allow iFrame From Youtube</title><info>iFrames pose a security risk and are disabled by default in the script. If you want to allow users to embed videos from youtube you can enable iframes only for youtube here.</info>
<title>Close SQL Connection During Conversion</title><info>Enable this option to close the SQL connection while converting videos.</info>

<title>Auto Play (Shared Videos)</title><info>If enabled this setting will attempt to auto play shared videos (eg. Youtube).
Note: This will only work on new videos being added.</info>
<title>Enable Full Screen for YouTube</title><info>Enable this option to enable the "Full Screen" feature for YouTube videos.</info>
<title>Show upload and share on Dashboard</title><info>Here you can choose whether to show just the "upload video" link, just the "share video" link or both on the dashboard.</info>

<title>Total "More From" Videos to Display</title><info>When viewing a video we list more videos that belong to the owner of the video. Define how many videos should be displayed within this block.</info>
<title>Total Related Videos to Display</title><info>Define how many related videos should be displayed when viewing a video.</info>
<title>Video File Size Limit</title><info>File size limit in megabytes.</info>
<title>Video Meta Description</title><info>Meta description used within the video section.</info>
<title>Video Meta Keywords</title><info>Meta keywords used within the video section.</info>
The video you are trying to sponsor cannot be found.
To purchase sponsor space for your video, view your video by clicking on it and then click on "Sponsor" on the right hand side menu
Payment for the sponsor space of video: {sVideoTitle}
There are {iVideoApproveCnt} videos that are pending approval.
There is one video that is pending approval.
The file size limit is {iMaxFileSize_filesize}. If your upload does not work, try uploading a smaller picture.
The video you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
Unable to edit this video as there is no video ID#
Unable to embed this video due to privacy settings.
Unable to find the video image you plan to delete.
Unable to find the video you plan to delete.
Unable to find the video you plan to edit.
Unable to find the video you want to approve.
Unable to post a comment on this item due to privacy settings.
Unable to view this item due to privacy settings.
Update video "view" count (Only for those that upgraded from v1.6.21).

You retain all rights in your video that you upload. You must only upload videos in which you own all the rights. If you upload any videos in which you do not own all the rights, you may be violating copyright law.
Upload failed. File is too large.
Upload problems? Try the basic uploader (works on older computers and web browsers).
{user_name} left you a comment on your video "{title}". To view this comment, follow the link below: {link}
Should videos added by this user group be approved before they are displayed publicly?

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the video be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored video space before it is shown in the site.
Can browse and view the video channel module?
Can delete videos added by other users?
Can edit videos added by other users?
Can members of this user group purchase a sponsored ad space?
Can members of this user group mark videos as sponsor?

How many minutes should a user wait before they can share/upload another video?
Note: Setting it to "0" (without quotes) is default and users will not have to wait.
Max file size for photos upload in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For unlimited add "0" without quotes. Notice: Photos are only uploaded if we were unable to convert/import photos.
Points received when adding a video.
How much is the sponsor space worth? This works in a CPM basis.
Videos for this profile is set to private.
Video successfull added, however you will have to manually upload a photo for it.
Your video has been approved on {site_title}
Your video has been approved on {site_title}.nnTo view this video, follow the link below:n {sLink}
Your video has successfully been uploaded. Please standby while we convert your video.
You are sharing a video a little too soon.
You are uploading a video a little too soon.
You cannot rate your own video.
You can upload a JPG, GIF or PNG file.

How many videos will be grabbed when adding a channel?

Can set an "Allow List" when adding a new channel?
Note: This setting will give the user the feature to add a list of users that can view their video.
Are you sure? It will delete all videos that belong to this channel and cannot be undone.
How many videos will be get automatically when updating a channel?
Added channels already reached the limit.
How many channels can a user add?
Provide a title for this channel.

who can add channels on page
Please provide a valid URL for your channel.
Can page owner add channel on pages?

<title>How many subcategories to show at first</title><info>This setting tells how many subcategories are to be shown at first. If the list of subcategories is longer than this value the extra ones will be hidden and a "View More" option will be shown instead, allowing the user to display the hidden subcategories.
a "View Less" option will be available to provide the full "accordion" effect.
If you set it to zero ("0" without quotes) it will hide every subcategory and a plus sign will show next to the category name, clicking the plus sign will show that category's subcategories.</info>
<title>Use Youtube iFrame</title><info>Use Youtube iFrame to display the video on Video Channel module.</info>
<title>Allow Using Youtube Iframe</title><info>Allow using Youtube iframe to display video on Video Channel.</info>
Category "{language_name}" name must be less than {limit}
Are you sure you want to delete this video permanently?
